page.title: 13Life Styles
page.content: Retired: Largest group. Mostly live in their own comfortable houses. Well kept gardens which they maintain with some paid help. All have cars. Most have children and grand children. They take part in local events. As there is no local industry except farming the wage-earners commute to London,Basing- stoke and Winchester working as solic- itors ,bankers,accountants,on staff of Carless Oil Exploration and Hampshire County Council.One is a pilot for British Airways. Most families have 2 cars. Farmers enjoy a high standard of living and are happy in rural pursuits Their employees live in good modern cottages. Children: Those educated by the State go to primary school in Upton Grey and to Comprehensive School in Odiham. Most are privately educated at Day or Boarding Schools. They ride, swim,play tennis,cricket and football.
